TEXT.S:
balat
siwkay nu balat balat sa , caay kaw nu mabesucay, pitelekay mibelih.
tinaku a kamu balaten ...;( mabalat amana balaten ku ni'neng i wawelwel! mabalatay mabalat ku ukak nu buting i takulaw nu wacu. mibalat mabalatay ku culil nu kalang. mibalatay nayi' tu ku mibalatay i zazan a kilang. pibalati amana pibalati miketun tu zazan! masabalatay a bali pabalaten niza ku luma'.
u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika wind blowing straight across from the east He put up the crossbeams of the house.
